1: Make yeast starter to reach target yeast pitch rate
2: Start with 10 Gallons of Water to Mash @ 156 F
4: Sparged with (hot tap water) until 13 Gallons in Kettle.
5: Remove 1 Gallon wort and put on stove to boil. Let go for 45 minutes, stir continuously
6: Bring kettle to a boil. Boil for 60 mins.
9: Add vanilla with 10 mins left in boil
11: Chill to 20C (~ 11 mins with immersion chiller)
12: Boil oak chips for 10 mins in water, drain
14: Transfer to fermentor, add O2 (didn't have O2, so just splashed for ~15 mins)
15: Pitch all 2.5L of yeast. (didn't allow time to settle)
19: Allow Oak to soak in fermentor for 2 weeks
20: Transfer to kegs, leaving chips behind
